main event: Two U.S. Navy pilots observed bright green lights in the sky near Guam, suspected to be part of an interplanetary craft.
interesting points: The first pilot observed a green light at a distance of approximately 10 miles on a collision course,The green light came within 100 feet of the aircraft before making a 90-degree turn and disappearing,The second pilot observed a bright light larger than a star traveling at high speed,The sightings occurred on the same day but at different times and altitudes,The reporting officer suggested that the intelligence agencies give adequate attention to these sightings.
witness description: U.S. Navy pilots Lt. J.G. R.H. Tillow and Lt. J.G. W.A. Flaherty
